title: UPMC Center for Integrative Medicine
description: Learn more about the Center for Integrative Medicine at UPMC Shadyside, where we combine natural healing practices with conventional medicine.
cleaned_text: The Center for Integrative Medicine at UPMC Shadyside is the first hospital-based center in Pittsburgh to combine [natural healing practices with conventional medicine](/services/integrative-medicine/services). "Integrative medicine" refers to the incorporation of evidence-based complementary therapies into conventional treatments for patients. Integrative medicine is meant to work in conjunction with traditional medicine, providing a more holistic approach to healing — mind, body, and spirit. New Yoga Group: Chair Yoga for Seniors [Learn more about the group (PDF).](https://dam.upmc.com/-/media/upmc/services/integrative-medicine/classes/documents/chair-yoga.pdf?la=en&rev=aa0a590ee21946cb8bc2488df91a4684&hash=43F3704305188717004F159D5126E9DE) Schedule of Yoga Classes on Wednesdays as of July 2023 These are semi-private classes - max. 5 persons - 11:00 am to 12:30 pm Intermediate 1 YOGA - 1:00 pm to 2:30 pm Beginner 2 YOGA NOTE: - There are 2 places available in Intermediate 1 class - There is 1 place available in Beginner 2 class Please, review the description of classes one wants to attend. Description of Classes - Intermediate 1 Class is for those who have achieved some proficiency in yoga postures & are interested in deeper aspects of Yoga Science: pranayama & asanas are more challenging, basic philosophy and yoga life style are explored. - Beginner 2 Class is for those who have completed Beginner 1 Classes (not offered at the Center at the present) and requires ability to work on the matt & on the floor with ease; some flexibility and strength, & fair balance are needed. The Fee for 4 classes is $69.00 paid in advance (no refund for missed classes). One may Drop-In to any Class, if there is space, @ a fee of $24.00/class. Please call 412-623-3023 to sign up for class. This notice will be updated each month.
